readable.title: 2384728877_48c85d58af
readable.content: A girl dressed in a red polka dot dress holds an adults hand while out walking . A young girl dressed in a Minnie mouse outfit and an older woman walking down the sidewalk . The woman is holding the hand of the little girl in the red dress with the polka-dotted skirt . two indian women walk down a road . Woman with headscarf and girl in red costume dress walk through urban area .
